reviews.customers_say: Customers love this dress's boho vibe and unique design, noting it's perfect for summer occasions and versatile enough for both casual and dress-up wear. Customers disagree on the sizing, with some reporting it runs small.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Dress!
items.body: I have 2 of these dresses now and they are so comfortable and look nice! I love the bodice with the empire waist and full sleeves. The skirt is not too full, but flows and drapes nicely. I do have to iron these after washing and line drying, but I like the dress so much it is okay! I would like another one in a Grey or dark green small print. Read more
items.author: Kari H.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE, LOVE, LOVE THIS DRESS!!!‚ô•Ô∏èüåøü§ó
items.body: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE EVERYTHING about this dress!! Lovely, soft, feminine & flowy material. Super comfortable! I wash it on delicate, cold water & hang to dry. I have gotten so many compliments! I am 5‚Äô 6 1/2‚Äù, 117 lbs. Ordered Small. I very much enjoy is being a little loose & the length is perfect as it comes to 2‚Äù above my ankle bone. This dress is not see through & very breathable. The material is perfect! It‚Äôs not too thin, and it great quality. Wish it had pockets! I‚Äôm about to order another one in a different print. Read more
items.author: Exactly what I needed! Works great!

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fabric a but thin but dress is cute
items.body: I bought this on a recommendation for a friend. I like the different pattern/color options and the dress is cute. The material is a bit thin, I felt like I needed to wear a slip. However, for summer it does make it cool. the fit seemed a bit weird when I first put it on, the top doesn't have a really defined area where the sleeves start so in certain positions, it seemed like it was a bit droopy around the chest area, like maybe I needed to be a bit larger there. But, it's very comfortable and I did get some compliments on it! It comes VERY wrinkled so plan on throwing it in the washer or dryer or doing some ironing. This dress does not have pockets. I did feel like it was a bit pricey for the thin fabric. Read more
items.author: Ramona O.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning Dress
items.body: I purchased this dress to wear to my sons graduation. I wanted something comfortable and light weight that was flattering and stylish, and this did not disappoint! This dress is made of a lightweight material that was perfect for a hot Texas day. The color was a true black and has remained just as vibrant even after washing! I purchased a Large, as I wanted a loose, flowy fit and it was perfect! For reference I am size 8-10 so could have gone with a medium, but wanted the oversized fit for breathability and comfort. I will be purchasing this in other colors as it has now become a staple in in wardrobe! Read more
items.author: Shannon J.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Size runs a little small.
items.body: Loved the dress. I ordered a size bigger than usual. The top was too small for my chest. I gave it to a friend and it fit her better. She looks fabulous in it. Read more
items.author: The dress came with stains on the back and left shoulder . Not happy with purchase.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering Dress to cover a bulging stomach
items.body: Great dress. It does not cling and flows easily. It is so comfortable. I have 2 of these dresses. I am 5 ft. 2 and weigh 160 lbs. I have had 4 C sections so it is difficult to find a flattering dress that covers the tummy area and yet does not look like a sack. I normally wear a Large in a dress but I get this dress in a Medium and it fits perfectly. So comfortable! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like the material and the style.
items.body: This is my idea of an almost perfect little black dress for me, an older woman who does not like to show too much skin. This dress is modest, a bit boho and begs for accessories, which I love to experiment with. Would love it in a medium weight silk but that would be very expensive, or would it? I bought 2 more of these dresses in prints and love them for summer. The rayon material is soft, cool washes well in cold water and low temperature dry, and doesn‚Äôt require ironing. Read more
items.author: Bob& L V

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Lovely flowy dress, but flimsy fabric.
items.body: The style of this dress is flattering, in a baggy boho sort of way, and especially so if you are thick in the torso. I am 5'5" 145 pounds and found the length good (hit just below ankle) and the fabric soft and flowy. The sleeves stop at a flattering point on my arms. I would say its true to size. I ordered a L and and XL to compare and the large fit me properly. The XL was too long in the bodice section, resulting in an unflattering fit. The black is a true deep black. The positives got the dress to 3 stars. However, I am disappointed in the quality of the rayon fabric. Although the fabric is quite thin, the packing creases did not steam out easily as with my other rayon dresses. It took several tries with a professional steamer, and even after that creases remain at the seams and gathering lines. The fabric then re-creases very easily. (It might be a better idea to mist it and then tumble in a warm dryer for a short time. ) After I removed all tags and wore the garment, I discovered that where the front bodice seam opens for the neckline that the fabric was shredded along the seam line. I was able to make a repair, but it was very difficult to do on this very thin rayon, and if the fabric wasn't such a dark matte black, would be very noticeable. I haven't washed it yet, but I think this fabric will have to be treated as an extreme delicate. Read more
items.author: hzf

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Rose Red Floral, Blue Khaki, Greygreen Pink Floral, Purple Floral, Black, Purple Orange Floral, Red Floral Yellow, Orange Rose Floral, Purple Pink Floral, Red Floral, Leopard Print, Blue, Green Floral, Light Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
